name: Beware of Falling Samurai (sharedcontrol)
description:
You are a Samurai falling down  a tower slashing everything in your way.

You can wall slide, wall jump and double jump. There's no air control.

You can SLASH your enemies or DIVE on their heads.

Combos will give you more points. You can spend your points on upgrades at the end of a level.

You can play it with a controller!

This game is part of Wizard Jam 5 , the Idle Thumbs community 2-week game jam.

Music by freesound.org/people/zagi2
